page_content: The page provides explanations on legal regulations for municipal accounting.
The page discusses the tax implications of premiums for health, accident, and disability insurances, as well as interest from savings capital.
The page provides an index of tax guides for various years.
The page discusses the tax treatment of pensions received from liability or private accident insurance.
The page discusses how to declare subsidies and insurance benefits for properties in the tax year.
The page provides information on paid leave options for vocational school teachers for professional development.
The page discusses the new tariff rates for home care services provided by Spitex in the Canton of Bern.
